faqitem.faqquest: How do I create a specialization?
faqitem.faqans: Create a DTD module in which the DTD elements derive from elements in an existing DTD module.

faqitem.faqquest: Which element should be the basis for my specialized element?
faqitem.faqans:
You should look for a base element that
Has a more general meaning that also applies to your content
Can accomodate the substructure of your content.
For example, this specialization is based on the simpletable element, which models information with a repeating substructure.

faqitem.faqquest: How do I format my specialization?
faqitem.faqans: First, consider whether the default formatting for the base elements meets your requirements. If not, create a new XSLT script that imports the base XSLT script and provides the special formatting for your specialized elements.

faqitem.faqquest: What if another DITA user needs to reuse my content but doesn't have my specialization?
faqitem.faqans: DITA provides a built-in generalization process that automatically promotes your specialized elements to the base elements that the other user already has.
